SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY IDX DESC) AS RNUM , IDX , BRAND , SERIES , MODEL , MODELNAME , PRICE , ZL_ZANGA , ZL_PAY1 , ZL_PAY2 , ZL_PAY3 , ZH_ZANGA , ZH_PAY1 , ZH_PAY2 , ZH_PAY3 , GH_PAY1 , GH_PAY2 , GH_PAY3 , DEPLOY_YN , REG_DATE , REG_ID FROM BMW_FS_PAYMENT WHERE 1=1
AND BRAND LIKE '%'+#brand#+'%'
AND SERIES LIKE '%'+#series#+'%'
AND MODEL LIKE '%'+#model#+'%'
)t WHERE 1=1 AND (RNUM BETWEEN #currentItem# AND #currentItemEnd# )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BMW_FS_PAYMENT WHERE 1=1
AND BRAND LIKE '%'+#brand#+'%'
AND SERIES LIKE '%'+#series#+'%'
AND MODEL LIKE '%'+#model#+'%'

SELECT IDX , BRAND , SERIES , MODEL , MODELNAME , PRICE , ZL_ZANGA , ZL_PAY1 , ZL_PAY2 , ZL_PAY3 , ZH_ZANGA , ZH_PAY1 , ZH_PAY2 , ZH_PAY3 , GH_PAY1 , GH_PAY2 , GH_PAY3 , DEPLOY_YN , REG_DATE , REG_ID FROM BMW_FS_PAYMENT WHERE IDX = #idx#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO BMW_FS_PAYMENT ( IDX , BRAND , SERIES , MODEL , MODELNAME , PRICE , ZL_ZANGA , ZL_PAY1 , ZL_PAY2 , ZL_PAY3 , ZH_ZANGA , ZH_PAY1 , ZH_PAY2 , ZH_PAY3 , GH_PAY1 , GH_PAY2 , GH_PAY3 , DEPLOY_YN , REG_ID ) VALUES ( #idx# ,#brand# ,#series# ,#model# ,#modelName# ,#price# ,#zlZanga# ,#zlPay1# ,#zlPay2# ,#zlPay3# ,#zhZanga# ,#zhPay1# ,#zhPay2# ,#zhPay3# ,#ghPay1# ,#ghPay2# ,#ghPay3# ,#deployYn# ,#regId# )
